channel.title: PI - Connection Problems
channel.description: Sorry for all the threads, but I gave my new client out to my players and they said that when they start up the client, it stops at "requesting title screen" and then counts down? How do I fix this?

item.title: PI - Connection Problems
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Typhis Lord Typhis
item.description:
@Lord_Typhis wrote:

Sorry for all the threads, but I gave my new client out to my players and they said that when they start up the client, it stops at “requesting title screen” and then counts down? How do I fix this?

Read full topic
